EmailTemplate.name: Unmapped Status
EmailTemplate.subject: Unmapped Omni-Channel Status for {!Organization.Name} ({!$Setup.talkdesk__Talkdesk__c.talkdesk__Account__c})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You have an unmapped status
We detected a new unmapped status for your Omni-Channel integration in Talkdesk for Salesforce. Please login to your Salesforce account and map the new status on the Talkdesk Admin page so that changes in your agent's Omni-Channel status are reflected in real time in Talkdesk.
-The Talkdesk Team
